TopicTitle: First time poster looooooooong time player

Articles.Content:
Hey Everyone,

Have had the game from when it was still in early access on steam, But just desided to join the forum. KSP is probably the most played game in my collection.

 

Ben

Hello @PsychoRolla, and welcome aboard!

KSP had been in Early Access for a long time, but with the changes implemented since .90, you could almost say it's a new game.

Welcome aboard!

Nice to see that you joined the forums after playing for a while.

Welcome to the community! It's the best one I've ever joined.
